title: FULL SHOW: We Chat With Regina Hall, Listeners Ask For Advice, We Celebrate "Knuck If You Buck"
itunes:title: FULL SHOW: We Chat With Regina Hall, Listeners Ask For Advice, We Celebrate "Knuck If You Buck"
description:
Today on The Breakfast Club we have legendary actress Regina Hall in studio joining the show to talk her film. During the interview we talk about her private love life and Crime Mob's iconic cult classic. Later on listeners call in to ask Angela their personal advice questions and it gets REAL!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
